page.title: 01Introduction.
page.content: The area covered by our D-block has undergone extensive development in the post war period.Open spaces have been gradually built upon and so residential areas have grown.It is a part of the "commuter land" around London,with a large number of people travelling into the City to work. The people who live in this area have the best of both worlds.London and its attractions are only a short train ride away and the services into the City are frequent.Yet the countryside is right on the doorstep and a short car or bus ride can take you away from the bustle of town life. The schools that compiled the information on this part of the outer London suburbs,offer it as an insight to the area to those who are interested.
